data.author: Shirk

changelog.release_notes:
* add a Pebblekit-JS based configuration to go along with gesture based version
* fix missing characters in characterRegex which caused severe animation stutter and crashes in Beta4
* include 'regular' fonts version (select via config-window)
* fix battery display for latest Beta5

data.description:
A german watchface resembling a film poster.
Inspired and based on 'Filmplakat' for SDK 1.x.
See http://vimeo.com/81829802 for a Demo.

latest_release.release_notes:
* add a Pebblekit-JS based configuration to go along with gesture based version
* fix missing characters in characterRegex which caused severe animation stutter and crashes in Beta4
* include 'regular' fonts version (select via config-window)
* fix battery display for latest Beta5

data.title: Filmplakat2

data.author: WA1OUI

changelog.release_notes: Version 6.1 Corrected Version on Config page
V4.12 fixes a bug in the BG of the BT indicator
V4.10 adds the option for optional vibration on BT Loss.
Version 4.00 adds Configuration Page for International Date Format

data.description: This is the Logo of the ARRL (American Radio Relay League) which is the US National organization for Ham (Amateur) Radio. A Bluetooth indicator (and optional vibration when connectivity is lost) as well as battery percentage and a battery percentage bar (showing green for OK, Red for 20% or less, and blue for charging) are included.
data.title: ARRL

data.author: pneumeric
data.description: Displays the time using domino pips.
data.title: Dominoes

data.author: Nubis
data.description: Pretty useless, but pretty.
data.title: Nubis Watchapp

data.author: Chris Connelley

changelog.release_notes: Version 1.3: Change in 1.3: Rewrote graphics initialization and changed back to watch face.

data.description:
Based on the Tokyoflash Round Trip watch ( http://www.tokyoflash.com/en/watch_museum/kisai/round_trip/ ) , this watch face tells the time in intervals of 3 minutes around the outside ring and the hour in the inside ring. The two sections at the bottom light up for the 1st and 2nd minute of the next three minute block.

The animated preview shows 11:57-12:00. There is no AM/PM indicator.

latest_release.release_notes: Version 1.3: Change in 1.3: Rewrote graphics initialization and changed back to watch face.

data.title: Rebel Base

data.author: mcongrove

changelog.release_notes: Updating configuration to allow faster releases in the future.

data.description:
A Pebble watch face based on the Extra Normal watch face. Hour hands turn to reveal the current time as it passes overhead.

Colors can be inverted by accessing the settings in the Pebble application.

latest_release.release_notes: Updating configuration to allow faster releases in the future.

data.title: Extra Normal

data.author: mcongrove

changelog.release_notes: Updating configuration to allow faster releases in the future.

data.description:
A Pebble watch face based on the Mask watch by Filip Slovacek. Each triangle turns to reveal the current time; hour on the outer, minute on the inner. The time is updated in 5-minute increments.

Colors can be inverted by accessing the settings in the Pebble application.

latest_release.release_notes: Updating configuration to allow faster releases in the future.

data.title: Mask

data.author: Jon Eisen
data.description:
A bold hour with small minutes. Always know what hour it is at a glance.

White numbers look best on dark watches.
data.title: Bold Hour (White)

data.author: Jon Eisen
data.description:
A bold hour with small minutes. Always know what hour it is at a glance.

Black numbers look best on light watches.
data.title: Bold Hour (Black)

data.author: Jon Eisen
data.description: Minimalist analog watchface using discs.
data.title: Discs

data.author: Georges
data.description:
Classical analog watch, but with a twist: turns counterclockwise!

12 hours displayed with short second hand version (supposed to be better for your battery life)

Displays Battery percentage on top, and day of month on left (it's a counterclockwise watch!)
data.title: ReverseShort

data.author: Georges
data.description:
Heure affichée en français, un peu comme "fuzzy time", c'est à dire par pas de 5 minutes.

L'affichage se fait au format 12 ou 24 heures selon le paramètre choisi dans les paramètres de votre Pebble (Settings->Date&Time->Time Display).

La ligne du haut affiche la date : jour de la semaine, jour du mois, mois et année.
(fuzzy french time)
data.title: Heure_FR

data.author: Andreas
data.description:
Simple clean and elegant watchface. Just one word is shown which shows you the time.

The word shows you the hour. The place shows you the minute. If the hour is exactly in the middle its point the hour. Every minute it moves a little bit to the right until it disapears from the screen. When the present hour is exactly half way out of the screen (cut into half), and the next hour is exactly half w
data.title: Word

data.author: WA1OUI

changelog.release_notes: Version 6.0: Added Clay Config page and coding enhancements
Version 4.10 makes the Loss of BT vibration optional.
Added Configuration Page for International Date format.

data.description: Here's the Rice University Logo. A Bluetooth indicator (and optional vibration when connectivity is lost) as well as battery percentage and a battery percentage bar (showing green for OK, Red for 20% or less, and blue for charging) are included.
data.title: Rice University Logo

data.author: Rephael Arfi
data.description: Elle indique le temps, en mode 12h ou 24h, ainsi que le jour de la semaine, la date et les secondes. Il ya aussi des animations très sympa qui peuvent être vus dans cette vidéo: http://d.pr/v/nQWY
data.title: Revolution French

data.author: John Warne
data.description: A watchface that makes it super easy to glance at the time/date. Support for 12/24H.
data.title: Divided

data.author: Zernyu Chou
data.description:
Bright and professional during day, dark and classy at night.

This watchface inverts colors at 6am and 6pm to reflect the time of day!
data.title: NightDay

data.author: Rich Wareham

changelog.release_notes: No functionality change. Re-built with BETA3 SDK.

data.description: A watch face which works in a similar way as the fortune telling toy. Normally the time and date are shown on your wrist but a single flick will transform it into one of the famous answers.

latest_release.release_notes: No functionality change. Re-built with BETA3 SDK.

data.title: 8 Ball Fortune Teller

data.author: Gabi Zuniga
data.description:
Hexa Time displays the time in binary format using hexagon tiles.
Left column shows the date while the 3 right columns show the time (hour, minutes and seconds).
The time is also displayed in decimal format vertically with the first digit on top of the second digit.
data.title: Hexa Time

data.author: Felix Rotthowe
data.description: German Fuzzy Time
data.title: FuzzyZeit Zwei

data.author: Chrispazz
data.description: Leggi l'ora dal tuo Pebble nello stesso modo in cui la pronunceresti a voce.
data.title: FuzzyIta

data.author: Nosagadu
data.description:
Watchface basado en Modern Extra pero en Español.

- Despliega el estado de la conexión Bluetooth.
- Se visualiza el estado de la batería del Pebble.
- Indica cuando se esta cargando.
- Cuando la batería es menor al 20% entra en modo ahorro. (el segundero desaparece) 
- Los días de las semana están en Español
- Sensor de Movimiento para Invertir los colores de la Pantalla.
data.title: Moderno Analogo

data.author: piksel bitworks
data.description: My take on Fuzzy Time in Swedish.
data.title: Luddig Tid

data.author: Brent Fitzgerald
data.description: Simple, easy to read at a glance, open source.
data.title: Meter

data.author: Yaroslav Nechaev
data.description: Just a basic Simplicity watchface with day of the week and battery status information added
data.title: Simplicity2

data.author: Hamish Downer
data.description: It's eleven ... ish. The hours are still given as numbers, but everything else is "five or so", "past four", "almost ten" etc. It's how I'd describe time and I'm British, so it may not fit for others.
data.title: Very Fuzzy

data.author: knopfler19
data.description:
Traducción al castellano del watchface fuzzy_time.
Castilian (Spanish) version of fuzzy_time watchface.
data.title: Fuzzy Time ES 2 (Spanish fuzzy time)

data.author: jonwgeorge

changelog.release_notes: - Added '0' in front of single digit hours to keep date centered correctly.

data.description:
A watch face with a nostalgic retro gaming look.

Features:
- Battery life displayed as 4 hearts on top left, in 4 quarters of percentage (100%, 75%, 50%, 25%). Also shows charging status.
- Bluetooth connection indicator on top right. Pebble will vibrate and change the icon on loss of connection with phone.
- Displays time and date in an 8-bit style font.

latest_release.release_notes: - Added '0' in front of single digit hours to keep date centered correctly.

data.title: Retro Time

data.author: ttmm
data.description: One line. One direction. One more time again. Now with "bluetooth connection is lost" notification. 1TTMM is a part of awarded TTMM watchface collection for Pebble. http://www.ttmm.eu
data.title: 1TTMM

data.author: dotar
data.description: Glow is a simple stylish watchface, inspired by PHOSPHOR Curved E-Ink Digital Hour watch.
data.title: Glow

data.author: Kevin Chen
data.description: A clean, minimalist approach to displaying the time and date. Hours and minutes are displayed in the stamp, with the complete date underneath.
data.title: Postage

data.author: Bob Hauck

changelog.release_notes:
* Updated to SDK 2.0. 
* Slightly enlarged the font for the time to improve readablility.

data.description: In the style of the clock from Android 4.2. Orignal concept by cassidyjames.

latest_release.release_notes:
* Updated to SDK 2.0. 
* Slightly enlarged the font for the time to improve readablility.

data.title: Roboto

data.author: 8a22a
data.description: The time represented using British Sign Language numbers.
data.title: BSL Time

data.author: Ben Froman
data.description: A simple vertical watch face, displaying both time and date.
data.title: Side By Side

data.author: exe
data.description: Inspired by Japanese anime "Neon Genesis Evangelion" :D
data.title: EVA

data.author: dotar
data.description:
A quick way to view todays date, including week number.
You have the option to hide the week and month on the configuration page.
data.title: Today

data.author: Sawyer Pangborn

changelog.release_notes: 1.1: Fixed a bug where the watchface would crash if BT connectivity was lost and the watchface was restarted.

data.description:
A Space-Invaders style watchface. Credit to "Rhys Davies" for the original idea / artwork.

Character in the top left indicates bluetooth connectivity. If he goes away, you've lost connection. The percentage adjacent to that is the Pebble's battery status.

The numbers in the bottom left and bottom right are hour and minute, respectively.

latest_release.release_notes: 1.1: Fixed a bug where the watchface would crash if BT connectivity was lost and the watchface was restarted.

data.title: Space Time

data.author: King Pi

changelog.release_notes:
Respect watch's quiet time
Setting page can now be initialized correctly
Add back accidentally removed menu icon

-Black&White devices can choose either black or white color for text and background now
-fix the wrong positioning in Pebble Round
Black&White devices can choose either black or white color for text and background now

Support SDK4! Time and Date will display at top when Quick View appears so you won't miss any important information:)

Dropbox no longer displays configuration page so change host to Github. Sorry for inconvenience caused.

*Since I don't own Pebble round and Pebble 2, I can only test the watchface on emulator. Please feel free to contact me if you found any problem or have question about it. Thank you:)

Fix unable to save configuration problem in Pebble OG
Fix mouth position in Pebble OG due to bug of emulator

Add options:
-Hourly vibration
-Show phone battery level if phone browser supports(it seems only android supports in the meantime)

In last release, Pebble OG can't show the mouth animation due to CloudPebble's bug with Pebble team's confirmation. It seems it is fixed now.

Also found that they fixed another bug in SDK so it broke my workaround for configuration page. It caused configuration page not workable. It is fixed in this release too.

Fixed a bug in bluetooth status checking.

- Support Pebble Time Round
- Improve battery performance

Update to SDK 3 finally!

Through configuration page, user can
- set background color
- set text color
- enable to show date
- enable to show bluetooth connection icon
- enable to show battery level and icon
- enable to vibrate when bluetooth connection lost

Will be able to choose different kinds of cats in future release:)

data.description:
Cute maneki neko(lucky cat) on your watch and bring good luck to you:)
Beckoning and move mouth every minute.

Through configuration page, user can
- set background color
- set text color
- enable to show date
- enable to show bluetooth connection icon
- enable to show battery level and icon
- enable to vibrate when bluetooth connection lost
- enable hourly vibration (turn off by default)
- enable to show phone battery level if phone browser supports(it seems only android supports in the meantime)

latest_release.release_notes:
Respect watch's quiet time
Setting page can now be initialized correctly
Add back accidentally removed menu icon

data.title: Maneki Neko Watch

data.author: Łukasz Zalewski
data.description: Simple, yet elegant watchface with lovely animations.
data.title: Dotz

data.author: Jens Kirchheimer
data.description: Digital watch drawing time and date with dots.
data.title: Dots with date

data.author: exe
data.description: Inspired by the logo of wonderful game "FEZ"!
data.title: FEZ
